query:
SELECT id as "id!: i32", 
x_handle_verification_checkpoint as "x_handle_verification_checkpoint!: i64", 
suggested_price_per_point as "suggested_price_per_point!: String", 
last_synced_block as "last_synced_block!: Decimal", 
last_rewards_indexed_block as "last_rewards_indexed_block!: Decimal" FROM indexer_states WHERE (NOT $1::boolean OR id = $2::int4) AND (NOT $3::boolean OR x_handle_verification_checkpoint = $4::int8) AND (NOT $5::boolean OR suggested_price_per_point = $6::varchar) AND (NOT $7::boolean OR last_synced_block = $8::decimal) AND (NOT $9::boolean OR last_rewards_indexed_block = $10::decimal) ORDER BY 
      (CASE ($11 = 'Id' AND NOT $12) WHEN true THEN id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($11 = 'Id' AND $12) WHEN true THEN id ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($11 = 'XHandleVerificationCheckpoint' AND NOT $12) WHEN true THEN x_handle_verification_checkpoint ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($11 = 'XHandleVerificationCheckpoint' AND $12) WHEN true THEN x_handle_verification_checkpoint ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($11 = 'SuggestedPricePerPoint' AND NOT $12) WHEN true THEN suggested_price_per_point ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($11 = 'SuggestedPricePerPoint' AND $12) WHEN true THEN suggested_price_per_point ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($11 = 'LastSyncedBlock' AND NOT $12) WHEN true THEN last_synced_block ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($11 = 'LastSyncedBlock' AND $12) WHEN true THEN last_synced_block ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($11 = 'LastRewardsIndexedBlock' AND NOT $12) WHEN true THEN last_rewards_indexed_block ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($11 = 'LastRewardsIndexedBlock' AND $12) WHEN true THEN last_rewards_indexed_block ELSE NULL END) DESC
     LIMIT $13 OFFSET $14 FOR UPDATE
